headlines.description: — Chelsea coped just fine without its injured strikers.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea romps to 7-0 win over Norwich in Premier League

headlines.description: — Callum Wilson’s goal from an overhead kick rescued a 1-1 draw for Newcastle at Crystal Palace but the team now under Saudi ownership remained without a Premier League win after nine games this season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wilson's overhead kick earns Newcastle draw at Palace in EPL

headlines.description: Joshua King grabbed a hat-trick on his return to former club Everton in Watford's stunning 5-2 Premier League victory at Goodison Park as the visito
headlines.shortLinkText: King reigns supreme as Watford beat Everton 5-2

headlines.description: Spanish striker Rodrigo earned Leeds United a 1-1 home draw with Wolverhampton Wanderers as he scored a stoppage-time penalty.
headlines.shortLinkText: Leeds draw with Wolves with late penalty

headlines.description: Maxwel Cornet scored twice as struggling Burnley earned a 2-2 draw at Southampton in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cornet double earns Burnley a point

events.name: Manchester City at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Manchester City rode three first-half goals to an easy 4-1 win over Brighton and Hove Albion in the Premier League at the Amex Stadium.
headlines.shortLinkText: Foden scores brace as Man City beat Brighton
